tool_description: An API showing all the latest news about Climate Change around the world
name: Climate Change Articles From Newspapers
title: Climate Change Articles From Newspapers

api_list.name: Get Individual Source News
api_list.description: Get news about climate change from specific news source
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://climate-change-articles-from-newspapers.p.rapidapi.com/news/thetimes"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "climate-change-articles-from-newspapers.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://climate-change-articles-from-newspapers.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "climate-change-articles-from-newspapers.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All Climate Change News
api_list.description: This endpoint will return back all news about Climate Change from all over the world.
